1 Задание
+=====================+
HEX: 000000000000000c
DEC:                c
BIN: 0000000000001100

HEX: 000000000000000000000000f916000c
DEC:                         f916000c
BIN: 11111001000101100000000000001100


2 Задание
+=====================+
HEX: 000000000000ff82
DEC:             ff82
BIN: 1111111110000010

HEX: 000000000000000000000000ffffff82
DEC:                         ffffff82
BIN: 11111111111111111111111110000010

HEX: 00000000000000000000000000007f82
DEC:                             7f82
BIN: 00000000000000000111111110000010

HEX: 00000000000003da
DEC:              3da
BIN: 0000001111011010

HEX: 000000000000000000000000000003da
DEC:                              3da
BIN: 00000000000000000000001111011010

HEX: 000000000000000000000000000003da
DEC:                              3da
BIN: 00000000000000000000001111011010


3 Задание
+=====================+
Signed multiplication by 2:
A:
HEX: 000000000000ffd5
DEC:             ffd5
BIN: 1111111111010101

A*2:
HEX: 000000000000ffaa
DEC:             ffaa
BIN: 1111111110101010

==============================

Unsigned multiplication by 2:
B:
HEX: 000000000000001b
DEC:               1b
BIN: 0000000000011011

B*2
HEX: 0000000000000000
DEC:                0
BIN: 0000000000000000

==============================

Signed division by 2:
C:
HEX: 000000000000ffe6
DEC:             ffe6
BIN: 1111111111100110

C/2:
HEX: 000000000000fff3
DEC:             fff3
BIN: 1111111111110011

==============================

Unsigned division by 2:
D:
HEX: 000000000000003e
DEC:               3e
BIN: 0000000000111110

D/2:
HEX: 000000000000001f
DEC:               1f
BIN: 0000000000011111

==============================

E mod 16:
E:
HEX: 000000000000002b
DEC:               2b
BIN: 0000000000101011

E mod:
HEX: 000000000000000b
DEC:                b
BIN: 0000000000001011

==============================

Round F to 16x
F:
HEX: 0000000000000034
DEC:               34
BIN: 0000000000110100

F to 16x:
HEX: 0000000000000030
DEC:               30
BIN: 0000000000110000


4 Задание
+=====================+
Task 4 for M
SIGNED MOVE LEFT:
Before
0000001111011010
After
0000011110110100

UNSIGNED MOVE LEFT:
Before
0000001111011010
After
0000011110110100

SIGNED MOVE RIGHT:
Before
0000001111011010
After
0000011110110100

UNSIGNED MOVE RIGHT:
Before
0000001111011010
After0000011110110100

&15
Before0000001111011010
After0000000000001111=15
0000000000001010

&16
Before0000001111011010
After1111111111110000=-16
0000001111010000

Task 4 for N
SIGNED MOVE LEFT:
Before
1111111110000010
After
1111111100000100

SIGNED MOVE RIGHT:
Before
1111111110000010
After
1111111100000100

&15
Before1111111110000010
After0000000000001111=15
0000000000000010

&16
Before1111111110000010
After1111111111110000=-16
1111111110000000


5 Задание
+=====================+
Down: 976 Up: 992

6 Задание
+=====================+
Before:
HEX: 000000000000000000000000000003da
DEC:                              3da
BIN: 00000000000000000000001111011010

 Increment:
HEX: 000000000000000000000000000003db
DEC:                              3db
BIN: 00000000000000000000001111011011

 Decrement:
HEX: 000000000000000000000000000003da
DEC:                              3da
BIN: 00000000000000000000001111011010


Before:
HEX: 000000000000000000000000ffffff82
DEC:                         ffffff82
BIN: 11111111111111111111111110000010

 Increment:
HEX: 000000000000000000000000ffffff83
DEC:                         ffffff83
BIN: 11111111111111111111111110000011

 Decrement:
HEX: 000000000000000000000000ffffff82
DEC:                         ffffff82
BIN: 11111111111111111111111110000010


Before:
HEX: 00000000000000000000000000000000
DEC:                                0
BIN: 00000000000000000000000000000000

 Increment:
HEX: 00000000000000000000000000000001
DEC:                                1
BIN: 00000000000000000000000000000001

 Decrement:
HEX: 00000000000000000000000000000000
DEC:                                0
BIN: 00000000000000000000000000000000


Before:
HEX: 0000000000000000000000003f800000
DEC:                         3f800000
BIN: 00111111100000000000000000000000

 Increment:
HEX: 0000000000000000000000003f800001
DEC:                         3f800001
BIN: 00111111100000000000000000000001

 Decrement:
HEX: 0000000000000000000000003f800000
DEC:                         3f800000
BIN: 00111111100000000000000000000000


Before:
HEX: 0000000000000000000000004b3c614e
DEC:                         4b3c614e
BIN: 01001011001111000110000101001110

 Increment:
HEX: 0000000000000000000000004b3c614f
DEC:                         4b3c614f
BIN: 01001011001111000110000101001111

 Decrement:
HEX: 0000000000000000000000004b3c614e
DEC:                         4b3c614e
BIN: 01001011001111000110000101001110


Before:
HEX: 0000000000000000000000004ceb79a3
DEC:                         4ceb79a3
BIN: 01001100111010110111100110100011

 Increment:
HEX: 0000000000000000000000004ceb79a4
DEC:                         4ceb79a4
BIN: 01001100111010110111100110100100

 Decrement:
HEX: 0000000000000000000000004ceb79a3
DEC:                         4ceb79a3
BIN: 01001100111010110111100110100011

HEX: 00000000000000000000000000000000
DEC:                                0
BIN: 00000000000000000000000000000000

DEC:                                1
BIN: 00000000000000000000000000000001

HEX: 00000000000000000000000000000000

BIN: 00000000000000000000000000000000


Before:
HEX: 000000000000000000000000ffffffff
DEC:                         ffffffff
BIN: 11111111111111111111111111111111

 Increment:
HEX: 00000000000000000000000000000000
DEC:                                0
BIN: 00000000000000000000000000000000

 Decrement:
HEX: 000000000000000000000000ffffffff
DEC:                         ffffffff
BIN: 11111111111111111111111111111111


Before:
HEX: 00000000000000000000000080000000
DEC:                         80000000
BIN: 10000000000000000000000000000000

 Increment:
HEX: 00000000000000000000000080000001
DEC:                         80000001
BIN: 10000000000000000000000000000001

 Decrement:
HEX: 00000000000000000000000080000000
DEC:                         80000000
BIN: 10000000000000000000000000000000


Before:
HEX: 0000000000000000000000007fffffff
DEC:                         7fffffff
BIN: 01111111111111111111111111111111

 Increment:
HEX: 00000000000000000000000080000000
DEC:                         80000000
BIN: 10000000000000000000000000000000

 Decrement:
HEX: 0000000000000000000000007fffffff
DEC:                         7fffffff
BIN: 01111111111111111111111111111111
